item.description:
Happy Holidaze!

Given the holiday schedule we will not have any formal presentation this month -- just time to meet, talk shop, exchange some business cards.

We're trying a new venue that (a) is in Cambridge; and (b) will have a cash bar.

And if that's not enough incentive to come, bring your business card (we'll have blanks if you don't) so you can enter to win a brand spanking new Flip Video!

Any questions or ideas, just shoot me an email!

Jerry Johnson
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy with the Flip Video camera
item.name: Boston BioTech Holiday Mixer - Come and Win A FlipVideo!
